titleStmt.title: An Answer to tvvo Danish papers the one called Jus feciale armatae Daniae, the other, A manifest / faithfully translated out of the Latine original, which was published by the King of Swedens command.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Daniel Pakeman, and are to be sold at the Rain-bow in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
